survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate participant experiences and satisfaction with hybrid events (combining in-person and virtual elements) to improve future event planning and execution.

questions.question_text: Which type of event did you primarily attend?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for clear single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: Which type of event did you primarily attend?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall hybrid event experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall hybrid event experience?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the virtual event platform did you find most useful?
questions.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant features. Use checkboxes.

script.question_text: What aspects of the virtual event platform did you find most useful?
script.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual'

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face while attending the event virtually?
questions.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture diverse responses. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face while attending the event virtually?
script.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual'

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the in-person venue (e.g., location, facilities, safety measures)?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Did not attend in-person' as an opt-out option for virtual attendees.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the in-person venue (e.g., location, facilities, safety measures)?

questions.question_text: Did the hybrid format make the event more accessible to you?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for clear single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Did the hybrid format make the event more accessible to you?

questions.question_text: Which communication channels did you use to stay updated about the event?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all communication channels used.

script.question_text: Which communication channels did you use to stay updated about the event?

questions.question_text: Would you attend another hybrid event in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure likelihood accurately.

script.question_text: Would you attend another hybrid event in the future?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve future hybrid events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Limit to 1000 characters.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve future hybrid events?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this hybrid event to a colleague or friend?
questions.client_notes: Use an 11-point scale for granularity. Display as a slider on digital platforms.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this hybrid event to a colleague or friend?
